item.title: Azure WAF – Masking Sensitive Data
item.description: Introduction Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF) on Azure Application Gateway provides centralized protection of web applications from common web application vulnerabilities. You can monitor how your Azure WAF resources are processing the traffic using the WAF logs which are written to the designated location i.e., Log Analytics Workspace, Storage Account, Partner Solution etc. These logs typically contain requests which are matched or blocked by the WAF rules and can provide valuable information for monitoring, auditing, and troubleshooting purposes. For ease of usage and analysis, WAF logs ...
